EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_Meetups.February 2015 meetups - CA targeted
EmailTemplate.subject: Meetups: Introducing Spring Session and Introduction to Hadoop Security
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Join us this month for two awesome meetups in the San Francisco Bay Area.
Next week Josh Long will introduce Spring Session and demonstrate why it's a perfect fit for working with user data, in a highly distributed environment like the cloud, or on a Platform like Cloud Foundry.
- Introducing Spring Session - Thursday, February 12, 2015, Pivotal San Francisco - Learn more and Register here: bit.ly/POSH0062 <bit.ly/POSH0062>
And later this month Roman Shaposhnik will provide a whirlwind tour for moving your Hadoop clusters from POC to production in a fully secure manner.
- Introduction to Hadoop Security - Thursday, February 26, 2015, Pivotal San Francisco - Learn more and Register here: bit.ly/POSH0063 <bit.ly/POSH0063>
We're looking forward to seeing you!
